job_description:
Key Responsibilities:
• Sales and Profitability Growth: Focus on achieving corporate goals in sales and profitability by engaging effectively with representatives and distributor partners.
• Communication and Organization: Require excellent communication and organizational skills to manage relationships and sales strategies effectively.
• Collaboration for Sales Planning: Work closely with the Regional Sales Manager to develop sales plans and inventory forecasts.
• Promoting Business Relationships: Actively promote and maintain profitable business relationships with current and potential customers, including manufacturer representatives and distributors.
• Market Expansion: Engage key end-users and contractors to introduce the company to new and progressive markets.
• Training and Technical Guidance: Provide training, technical guidance, and assistance regarding products and applications to representatives, distributors, and contractors.
• Travel: Be prepared for business-related travel as required.

Qualifications:
• Experience: 1-3 years in electrical sales and selling through electrical distribution.
• Skills: Strong presentation, communication, and interpersonal skills are essential.
• Utility Company Experience: Prior experience working with utility companies is highly advantageous.

Compensation and Benefits:
• Salary: $50,000 - $150,000 per year.
• Benefits: Include health, dental, and vision insurance, paid time off, and holiday pay.
• Compensation Package: Offers bonus opportunities and commission pay.
• Schedule: Monday to Friday, with a standard work schedule and 30 minutes for lunch.
• Travel Requirement: Up to 25% travel.
• License/Certification: Driver's License is preferred.

Work Location:
• In-person role.

Application Process:
• Send a resume and cover letter to info@nebulitetech.com.

Suggestions for Applicants:
• Understand LED Market Trends: Familiarize yourself with current trends and advancements in the LED lighting industry, particularly in commercial and industrial applications.
• Develop Product Knowledge: Gain in-depth knowledge of NBL's product offerings, including outdoor and indoor luminaires and their applications.
• Networking Skills: Build and maintain a strong network in the electrical and lighting industry.
• Sales Strategy: Develop a solid sales strategy that aligns with the company's goals and market needs.

This role offers an exciting opportunity for individuals with a passion for LED lighting technology and a strong sales background. The position requires a balance of technical knowledge, sales acumen, and the ability to build lasting business relationships.
